name: The Cartoon Kitchen: White Beans and Cilantro
description: This week's Cartoon Kitchen features Serious Eats' cartoonist in residence Larry Gonick's spin on white beans. —Ed Levine...

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the beans overnight. Then simmer until tender, about 1 1/2 hours. Drain most of the liquid.
Gently sauté the garlic in olive oil, without browning. Add a couple of chopped tomatoes; sauté a bit more.
Combine with beans; reheat a bit. Add the cilantro a minute before serving. Salt and pepper to taste.
